TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class OdbcCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder

summary.span: 自動產生單一資料表命令，可用來調解對 的變更和相關的資料來源。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調解所做的變更所需的 SQL 陳述式不會自動產生與資料來源相關聯。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a associated with the data source. 不過，您可以建立藉由設定會產生單一資料表更新的 SQL 陳述式的物件屬性。However, you can create an object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the property of the . 接著會產生您未設定任何其他 SQL 陳述式。The then generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set. 之間的關聯性和其相對應一定是一對一。The relationship between an and its corresponding is always one-to-one. 若要建立這種對應關係，您設定屬性物件。To create this correspondence, you set the property of the object. 這會導致本身註冊為接聽程式，這會產生的輸出影響事件的。This causes the to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of events that affect the . 若要產生 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式使用屬性，以擷取所需的一組中繼資料。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata. 如果您變更的值中繼資料擷取，例如第一個更新之後，您應該都會接著呼叫之後方法來更新中繼資料。If you change the value of after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should then call the method to update the metadata. > [!NOTE] > 如果 SELECT 陳述式指派給屬性會使用別名資料行名稱，產生的 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 陳述式可能會不正確或失敗。If the SELECT statement assigned to the property uses aliased column names, the resulting INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements may be inaccurate or fail. 如果基礎 ODBC 驅動程式無法提供適當的基底資料行名稱做為別名資料行名稱 (使用 SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME 值`SQLColAttribute`)，在產生的 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 陳述式中可用的別名名稱。If the underlying ODBC driver cannot provide the appropriate base column name for the alias column name (using the SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME value of `SQLColAttribute`), the alias name could be used in the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements. 例如，Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle 傳回的別名名稱的基底的資料行名稱。For example, the Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle returns the alias name as the base column name. 因此，產生的 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 陳述式會導致錯誤。Therefore, the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements would cause errors. 也會使用， ，以及屬性所參考。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 使用者應該呼叫修改一或多個屬性，則值本身的屬性變更。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the value of the property itself is changed. 否則， ，和屬性會保留其先前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果您呼叫，則解除關聯，以及無法再使用產生的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用連同和、 從資料來源選取資料列。The following example uses , together with and , to select rows from a data source. 此範例會傳遞初始化，連接字串、 SQL SELECT 陳述式的查詢字串和資料來源資料表名稱的字串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the data source table. 這個範例會建立。The example then creates an . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自己註冊為接聽程式產生的事件這個屬性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 當您建立的新執行個體，任何現有與此相關聯發行。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

summary.span: 設定或取得 物件，這個 物件將會為它產生 SQL 陳述式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object for which this object will generate SQL statements.

value.span: 與這個 相關聯的 物件。

span.span: An object that is associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自己註冊為接聽程式產生的事件這個屬性中指定。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 當您建立的新執行個體，任何現有與此相關聯發行。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DeriveParameters(class System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand command) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DeriveParameters (command As OdbcCommand)

param.name: command
param.span: ，參考參數資訊衍生來源的預存程序。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 衍生的參數已加入到 的 集合。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 從 中指定的預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 擷取參數資訊，並填入 (Populate) 指定 物件的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會覆寫任何現有參數資訊。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要額外的呼叫到資料來源取得的資訊。 requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information. 如果事先已知參數資訊，它會更有效率的方式藉由明確設定的資訊填入參數集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 您只能使用預存程序。You can only use with stored procedures. 您無法使用填入使用任意的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，例如參數化的 SELECT 陳述式。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.

exception.span: 基礎 ODBC 驅動程式不支援傳回預存程序參數資訊，或是命令文字不是有效的預存程序名稱，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The underlying ODBC driver does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, or the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .
Automatically Generating Commands

summary.span: 取得在資料來源上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，您必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the still will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or .

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果為 ，則盡可能產生符合資料行名稱的參數名稱。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.

param.span: 若為 ，則會產生 @p1、@p2 等等。

span.span: If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

returns.span: 自動產生的 物件，執行刪除時所需要的。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform deletions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，您必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用`@p1`， `@p2`，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制執行產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 符合下列條件時，才會如此成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，且其長度為等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，您必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the still will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用`@p1`， `@p2`，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制執行產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 符合下列條件時，才會如此成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，且其長度為等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified.

span.span: Automatically Generating Commands

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

span.span: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the ODBC driver, calling SQLGetInfo(SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR).

param.span: 沒有傳遞連接時，會使用 和 中的值為字串加上引號。
